articles.title: Uber used Greyball fake app to evade police across Europe, leak reveals - The Guardian
articles.description: Firm’s bosses knew it was fooling authorities with tool showing phantom cars, documents show
articles.content: It was a trick as audacious as it was ingenious. When police or regulators opened the Uber app, they would see exactly what the public saw: dozens of cars crawling around the city, waiting to be summ… [+9008 chars]

articles.title: Thousands seeking unproven long Covid blood treatments abroad - The Guardian
articles.description: Unproven procedures such as apheresis, or ‘blood washing’, and anti-clotting therapy are being offered in Europe
articles.content:
Thousands of people with long Covid are travelling abroad to spend huge sums of money on unproven treatments such as blood washing, prompting warnings from experts and doctors.

articles.title: Sir Tom Jones concert postponed 'after singer is taken ill shortly before going on stage' - Wales Online
articles.description: It's been reported that Sir Tom was taken ill ahead of his latest European date in Budapest
articles.content: Sir Tom Jones has been forced to postpone a concert in Budapest after 'being taken ill', according to reports. The legendary Welsh singer, who celebrated his 82nd birthday last month, was reportedly … [+1668 chars]
